system.description:
A leather cloak which wraps around the wearer when submerged in salt water, granting them abilities like those of a manta ray.

  • Breathing water: The wearer can breathe underwater.

  • Movement: The wearer can swim at 180’ (60’) with ray-like wings.

  • Armour Class: The wearer’s AC is 6 [13], unless improved by magical armour or protective devices.

  • Attacks: The wearer can attack once a round with a tail barb (for [[/r 1d6]] damage) and may also free their arms from the cloak to make other attacks.

  • Disguise: While wearing the cloak underwater, the wearer is [[/br 1d100]]{90%} indistinguishable from a real manta ray.
